hero.title: Your Cloud, Your Rules.
hero.subtitle: Secure, scalable, and fully managed Nextcloud hosting. Take back control of your data.

plan.title: Our Sever Plans
plan.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you.
plan.moreTitle: Do you need even more users?
plan.moreText: Contact us and we'll figure it out.

security.title: Your Data, Safe and Private
security.subtitle: Your privacy is our top priority. Our infrastructure is designed to keep your data secure.
security.first: With Nextcloud, you can encrypt your data directly on your device, so no one else has access to it.
security.second: Your data is stored within the EU in certified data centers. You have full control over where your files are located.
security.third: We implement the latest security standards, including firewalls, DDoS protection, and regular security audits.

about.title: What is Nextcloud?
about.firstP: Nextcloud is an open-source file hosting and collaboration platform that gives you full control over your data. It's like your own private Google Drive or Dropbox, but with much more features.
about.secondP: Sync files, manage calendars, make video calls, and edit documents in real time—all on a single, secure platform.

performance.title: Built for Lightning-Fast Performance
performance.subtitle: Our infrastructure is optimized for maximum performance, ensuring your Nextcloud runs smoothly and without delays.
performance.first: All plans run on enterprise-grade NVMe SSDs, providing lightning-fast file loading and instant app responsiveness.
performance.second: We use the latest generations of server-grade processors that handle demanding operations and multiple users with ease.
performance.third: Our servers are connected to a high-speed network, ensuring fast uploads and downloads from anywhere in the world.

features.title: Everything you need in one package
features.subtitle: Every plan includes the full power of the Nextcloud Hub platform.
features.first: Sync and share your documents, photos, and other files. Access them from any device, anytime.
features.second: Secure video calls, chat, and screen sharing directly in your cloud — no external apps needed.
features.third: Manage your calendars, contacts, and emails all in one place. Fully integrated for maximum productivity.
features.fourth: Edit text documents, spreadsheets, and presentations right in your browser. Fully compatible with Microsoft Office formats.

faq.title: What is the main advantage of your service compared to large providers?
faq.content: Our main advantage is data sovereignty and a personal approach. Your data is stored in secure data centers within the EU, and you have full control over it. We're not a big corporation, so we can offer more flexibility and personalized support.

faq.title: Can I try the service first?
faq.content: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all our plans. If you're not satisfied with our service, we'll refund your payment — no questions asked.

faq.title: How does data migration from another provider work?
faq.content: Our team will gladly help you migrate your data. In most standard cases, we can handle the migration for you. Just contact our support and we’ll arrange the details.

faq.title: Is it possible to get a custom plan?
faq.content: Absolutely. If none of our standard plans fit your needs, we’ll be happy to prepare a custom offer tailored just for you. Simply fill out the request form on the 'Order' page.

cta.title: Are you ready to take control of your data?
cta.subtitle: Choose a plan, that fits you best, and start using it today. With our 14-day money-back guarantee, you won’t lose anything.

order.title: Complete Your Order
order.subtitle: Customize your plan and get started in minutes.
order.tooltip: Based on our estimation. Performance may be worse if you exceed this recommendation.
order.userAdd: Here you add your users and set their names. You can set how many you want.
order.userLimit: Keep in mind that the plan you selected can only handle so much users. You can always create new users later.
order.error: At least one user is required!
order.domainIncluded: A new domain is included with the Pro plan. This is a placeholder for the VEDOS API integration.
